titles.title: A bill for the relief of Chun Wei Wong, Bic Ya Ma Wong, Wing Sing Wong, Wing Yum Wong, and Man Yee Wong.

bill.summary: 4/21/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the granting of visas and admission to the United States for permanent residence to five named individuals.
